alert.note: Alert for Northern Centre; Northern Clinton; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 11:01PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL CENTRE AND CLINTON COUNTIES THROUGH MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1100 PM EDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 20 miles north of State College to 13 miles east of Bellefonte. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lock Haven, Bellefonte, Keating, Lamar, Zion, Mill Hall, Avis, Dunnstown, Flemington, Renovo, Castanea, Milesburg, Millheim, Snow Shoe, Blanchard, Clarence, Aaronsburg, McElhattan, Rebersburg and South Renovo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Centre; Northern Clinton; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton
